metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Appended to workbook displayNames to make them unique
Resource name for the logic app playbook.  No spaces are allowed

properties.description: Alerts from Tanium Threat Response (THR) that can be acted upon by Tanium Sentinel Playbook
properties.query:
let cap = (s:string) { strcat(toupper(substring(s,0,1)), substring(s,1))  };
TaniumThreatResponse_CL
| extend TaniumUrl = pack("computer_name", Computer_Name_s, "alert_guid", Alert_Id_g, "ip_address", Computer_IP_s, "platform", Match_Details_finding_system_info_platform_s)
| extend TaniumTHRLabel = strcat(cap(Intel_Type_s)," - ", cap(Intel_Name_s), " - ", cap(Match_Details_match_type_s))
| where Computer_IP_s !contains "N/A"
